name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね生誕祭2024 】ムシキングとラブベリ実機で遊んでみた‼ライブパートもあるよん‼【桃鈴ねね⧸hololive】 [mlsJvmN-z74]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene playing the 'Mushiking: The King of Beetles' arcade game, commenting on the match and sharing childhood memories of playing it at stores like Jusco.
MC section where Nene thanks the audience for the birthday celebration and introduces her next song, expressing her love for beetles and Mushiking.
Performance of the song 'Ikitekoso', the opening theme for the 'Mushiking' anime.

subtitles.original: できた！
subtitles.english: I did it!

subtitles.original: いくぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: これのために、この超必殺技合わせしてんだよ！
subtitles.english: I set up this super special move combo just for this!

subtitles.original: ムシキングってこういうゲーム！　見ててくださいよ！
subtitles.english: This is what Mushiking is all about! Watch this!

subtitles.original: もうこれが楽しくて、これが楽しくて！
subtitles.english: Oh, this is so fun, so fun!

subtitles.original: ハネがカタつく前にショウをみつけなきゃ。急ごう！
subtitles.english: Must find Sho before my wings stiffen. Let's hurry!

subtitles.original: ねねの行きつけだったのは...
subtitles.english: Nene's regular spot was...

subtitles.original: ジャスコとイトーヨーカドー。いろんな各地を回って全然並んでない所を探す...
subtitles.english: Jusco and Ito-Yokado. I'd go to various places looking for spots with no lines...

subtitles.original: 空気が変だ！　僕たちの手も震えている！
subtitles.english: The air feels strange! Our hands are shaking too!

subtitles.original: あ〜グー、チョキで、チョキにグーの最高スパ...
subtitles.english: Ah, rock, scissors... the best super move of rock against scissors...

subtitles.original: あ、さらに読まれている！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm being read even further!

subtitles.original: 読みが読まれてる！　あ、片付けろ言われてるｗ
subtitles.english: My read is being read! Ah, he's telling me to clean it up lol.

subtitles.original: あーまずい！
subtitles.english: Ah, this is bad!

subtitles.original: やばい、ノコギリクワガタとしてヒラタクワガタに負けられない！　わ、どうしよう！
subtitles.english: Oh no, as a Prosopocoilus inclinatus, I can't lose to a Dorcus titanus! Wow, what should I do!

subtitles.original: あ！え！まずいまずいまずい！やばい！あ、もっとヒートアップ！まずいまずい！
subtitles.english: Ah! Eh! Bad bad bad! Oh no! Ah, heating up more! Bad bad!

subtitles.original: あー絶対死んじゃった、やばい...
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm definitely dead, oh no...

subtitles.original: あぶっ！　やめて！　あぶねー！
subtitles.english: Ah! Stop! That was close!

subtitles.original: とどめをさしてやろう！
subtitles.english: I'll deliver the finishing blow!

subtitles.original: さすがに、さすがに超必殺技...
subtitles.english: As expected, as expected, a super special move...

subtitles.original: うわ、あぶなー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, close!

subtitles.original: まずい！　あー、ねねのキャラが！
subtitles.english: Bad! Ah, Nene's character!

subtitles.original: 投げられちゃったよー！
subtitles.english: I got thrown!

subtitles.original: 君は負けてしまった...
subtitles.english: You have lost...

subtitles.original: やだー！　勝ちの時、勝ちの時の画面も見たい！
subtitles.english: No way! I want to see the victory screen too!

subtitles.original: 甲虫王者ムシキング　スーパーコレクションもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Also, check out Mushiking: The King of Beetles Super Collection!

subtitles.original: よいしょ...　膝が、膝がもう力入れすぎちゃって...
subtitles.english: Heave-ho... My knees, my knees are just... I put too much strength into them...

subtitles.original: あ、次のお友達あ...　いない。いないいないいないわ。
subtitles.english: Ah, the next friend... is not there. They're not there at all.

subtitles.original: 次のお友達がいる時はこうやってずっと画面見られてるし、交換できるカードがないかずっと見られてるの。あ〜。
subtitles.english: When there's someone next in line, they're always staring at the screen and checking for cards to trade. Ahh.

subtitles.original: え〜っと、という、これもう一回やってもいいんですか？
subtitles.english: Umm, so, can I do this one more time?

subtitles.original: お、もうゲーム始まっちゃったｗ
subtitles.english: Oh, the game's already starting lol.

subtitles.original: はい！ というわけで、今回は本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, thank you so much for today!

subtitles.original: えーじゃあ最後にね、まあこの今広い、クソ広い森の中に来ていますので...
subtitles.english: Well then, finally, since we're here in this vast, freaking vast forest right now...

subtitles.original: ねねの、ムシキングの愛というか、虫への愛、ムシキングへの愛を、えー歌いたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to sing Nene's love for Mushiking, or rather her love for bugs, her love for Mushiking.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、ゲーム版ではなくアニメ版の、あのムシキングの曲、えー聞いてください。生きてこそ！
subtitles.english: So, please listen to the Mushiking song from the anime, not the game version. Ikitekoso!

subtitles.original: ママ私が生まれた日の
subtitles.english: Mama, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 空はどんな色
subtitles.english: what color was the sky?

subtitles.original: パパ私が生まれた日の
subtitles.english: Papa, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 気持ちはどうだった
subtitles.english: how did you feel?

subtitles.original: あれから言葉を覚えて
subtitles.english: Since then, I've learned words,

subtitles.original: 私なりの愛も
subtitles.english: and in my own way, love,

subtitles.original: 甘え方も体に染み込んだ
subtitles.english: and how to be spoiled have soaked into my body.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Just by living,

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: just by living,

subtitles.original: 今ここから始まる
subtitles.english: everything starts from here now.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Just by living,

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: just by living,

subtitles.original: 広がってまたつながる
subtitles.english: we expand and connect again.

subtitles.original: ママ私を初めて抱く
subtitles.english: Mama, when you held me for the first time,

subtitles.original: 気持ちはどうだった
subtitles.english: how did you feel?

subtitles.original: パパ私が生まれた日の
subtitles.english: Papa, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 嬉しかった
subtitles.english: were you happy?

subtitles.original: あれから奇跡を重ねて
subtitles.english: Since then, accumulating miracles,

subtitles.original: 私なりの愛も
subtitles.english: I want my own way of love,

subtitles.original: 出会いも育てていきたい
subtitles.english: and encounters to grow too.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Just by living,

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: just by living,
